traits.name: Surrica Teamwork
traits.desc: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your Surrica allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Dagger
traits.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
